DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effect intrathecal hydromorphone duration labor analgesia incidence epidural-associated temperature increase labor parturients . We hypothesize intrathecal administration longer-acting hydromorphone : 1 . Prolong duration improve quality analgesia labor , 2 . Decrease incidence epidural-associated temperature increase labor .
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible enrollment healthy , pregnant female age 18 45 year , primiparous , term gestation ( â‰¥ 37 week ) .
